ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Using Heritrix instead of Wget
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Frank. ... This is controlled by the Heritrix setting : max-bytes-download. The default setting is 0 (meaning unlimited) regards ... SÃ¸ren Vejrup
